text: “Gu nde nzuai, nde kha nuianan ki bigi gum ŋkɨɨa, nde tuituigira ntan guigira harigi gumgir kurkurav, mben kɨvntogir muuŋv kɨri. Nde maaŋ muuŋv kɨrim, mba nuiana ŋkɨɨa gum bigi vhɨzɨrga tuk hɨgɨrga, nta vhɨzɨrga, mba tugar nde Fhe Bakɨme gum ana enseri nden kamgirim, nde mbe han mba zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki phenin ŋgirgɨp zazera mbara muuŋgip kɨrga. 16.9 Kha buna nɨɨeŋ tuituigiap hɨgi fhuvara. Bigi kaŋgi gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Zisas khaŋ nzuai, nza wari won ŋkɨɨar mba bigi sosuagi gumgir kurkurarga. Mbe zumgum nzan ndikndigɨp nza Hevenan ŋgɨgɨrim, nza mbe phorgɨ kɨrga.
